author: Press Trust of India
title: Curly Tales' Kamiya Jani's Odisha trip snowballs into 'beef' controversy
text: Bhubaneswar: After her recent visit to Shree Jagannath Temple in Puri snowballed into a controversy, social media influencer Kamiya Jani on Sunday issued a clarification claiming that she is a Hindu and never consumed beef nor promoted it. Jani, the founder of Curly Tales and a food blogger, posted a video on her Instagram platform a day after Opposition Congress demanded an apology from Chief Minister Naveen Patnaik and a cultural outfit staged a demonstration in the state capital demanding action against her. The Opposition BJP has also made it an issue and demanded action against Jani and bureaucrat-turned-BJD leader VK Pandian, who allegedly facilitated her visit to the 12th century shrine. In the video message, Jani said, “My aim behind visiting the Shree Jagannath Temple in Puri was to seek the blessing of the deity and inform people about the infrastructure development of the shrine. Unfortunately, my visit has become controversial”. Noting that the temple authorities have rules, Jani said, “I want to clarify that I haven’t broken any rule. I am a practicing Hindu. I have neither consumed beef nor promoted it.” Jani said that as a food blogger, she has informed people about local cuisines of various places and that’s what happened in the Kerala video, whose screenshots are being used. “This might be a misunderstanding. This clarification is to put an end to the misunderstanding,” she said in the video. Earlier, the BJP projected her as a “beef eater” and also a promoter of beef consumption. The saffron party raised questions as to how she was allowed entry into the 12th century shrine which is strictly for only Hindus. The party demanded action against Jani and 5T (transformation initiative) chairman VK Pandian for allegedly facilitating her visit to the temple. On the other hand, BJD MP Manas Mangaraj questioned the BJP for objecting to the visit of Jani to the Jaganath temple while the BJP government at the Centre was making documentaries by engaging Jani. “BJP government appointed Kamiya Jani to make films on Hindu heritage and temples. She has gone to Chardham and Ayodhya to see Ram Lalla. And all of you love her for that,” Mangaraj said. Meanwhile, Union Minister Giriraj Singh on Friday criticised the “total disregard” for the sanctity of the 12th-century shrine. “By facilitating entry of a beef promoter into the revered shrine, VK Pandian has shown utmost disregard to religion, history and spirituality,” Singh wrote on X while demanding immediate and serious action against those responsible. Union minister Dharmendra Pradhan on Saturday issued a calculated statement saying, “Lord Jagannath is the centre of faith for all Odias and Sanatanis. Therefore, nothing should be done to hurt the sentiments of people, knowingly or unknowingly. No one should play with Odias’ unwavering love, devotion and reverence for the Lord.” He refrained from making any direct reference to Jani. OPCC president sarat Pattnayak demanded an apology from Patnaik if Jani’s visit to the temple was done as per his instruction. Shree Jagannath Sankruti Surakha Abhijan, a local outfit, also staged a demonstration in Bhubaneswar, demanding action against Jani and Pandian. While Jani has issued clarification twice over the issue so far, Pandian has distanced himself from the matter and avoided questions on the row. “Jai Jagannth” was the reply of Pandian while asked to react over the matter.

author: MDZ Deportes
title: Crisis en River: qué pasó en la reunión entre Demichelis y Francescoli, tras la caída ante Godoy Cruz - MDZ Online
text: El director técnico se reunió con los integrantes de la Secretaría Técnica de la institución y se refirieron al futuro del DT en el cargo. Pese a comenzar ganando en Mendoza, River vivió un verdadero infierno en el Malvinas Argentinas. Además de caer ante Godoy Cruz y sumar su sexto partido al hilo sin poder sumar de a tres fuera del Monumental, los jugadores del Millonario fueron insultados por sus propios hinchas. Como consecuencia, una vez más, se puso en tela de juicio el nombre de Martín Demichelis al frente del primer equipo del elenco de Núñez. Después de que se retirara sin dar declaraciones del estadio mundialista, durante la tarde de este jueves el director técnico mantuvo una reunión con Enzo Francescoli y Leonardo Ponzio. El Monumental fue el escenario elegido para que Micho se viera las caras con los integrantes de la Secretaría Técnica de la institución. Luego de tocar varios aspectos, fundamentalmente el anímico en medio de la mala racha que le toca afrontar al equipo, estos le expresaron todo su apoyo de cara el futuro. También, realizaron un balance del mercado de pases que afrontó el club. Tal y como se habló a lo largo de la jornada, y como posteriormente confirmó César Luis Merlo, la continuidad de Martín Demichelis nunca estuvo en duda para los integrantes de la Comisión Directiva. Ahora, el director técnico de River se prepara para el próximo compromiso en condición de local, donde se espera que el recibimiento de los hinchas no sea el mejor tras la caída en Mendoza. Según trascendió durante la mañana, Micho reunió a su cuerpo técnico y les confirmó su convicción de continuar en el cargo pese al clima hostil que pueda llegar a vivir en el Monumental. "Palabras más, palabras menos, les dijo algo así como 'por más que me puteen más de 80.000 personas, estoy convencido de que nuestro trabajo va a sacar adelante al equipo'. Esa es la postura del técnico de River", contó Gustavo Yarroch en la pantalla de ESPN. author: EFE
title: Premios Pulitzer honran la labor de periodistas palestinos en la guerra en Gaza
text:
Nueva York. La Junta de los prestigiosos Premios Pulitzer otorgó en su 108 edición una mención especial a "la valiente labor" de los periodistas palestinos que cubren la guerra en Gaza desde el pasado 7 de octubre, así como hacia sus compañeros fallecidos mientras informaban de dicho conflicto. "Este año, se reconoce la valiente labor de los periodistas y trabajadores de los medios de comunicación que cubren la guerra en Gaza. En condiciones espantosas, un número extraordinario de periodistas han muerto en el esfuerzo por contar la historia de los palestinos y los trabajadores humanitarios en Gaza ", detalló la organización este lunes durante la retransmisión virtual de estos galardones.
Los Premios Pulitzer, entregados por la Universidad de Columbia (Nueva York) a lo más selecto del periodismo , los libros, el teatro y la música, expresaron este lunes que anteriormente ya habían reconocido el trabajo de periodistas en guerras como la de Ucrania o Afganistán y que esta mención especial va más allá por su eco en otros campos.
Lee también: La escritora mexicana Cristina Rivera Garza, reconocida con el Premio Pulitzer de Biografía por “El invencible verano de Liliana”
"Esta guerra (Gaza) también se ha cobrado la vida de poetas y escritores (...) Con la entrega de los Premios Pulitzer a las categorías de Periodismo, Artes y Letras conmemoramos la pérdida de valiosísimos testimonios en primera línea que ilustran el sufrimiento humano", concluyó el comunicado de la Junta.
Entre todos los premios en categorías periodísticas de los Pulitzer, la guerra en Gaza también estuvo presente en otros apartados como el que condecora a lo mejor del periodismo internacional.
To read more about the 2024 #Pulitzer winners and nominated finalists, click below. https://t.co/lh83to0Z7H
— The Pulitzer Prizes (@PulitzerPrizes) May 6, 2024 En esta categoría, el premio recayó sobre la redacción de The New York Times por su "amplia y reveladora" cobertura del "ataque letal" de una facción del grupo islamista Hamas en el sur de Israel el 7 de octubre, así como por sus informaciones sobre "los fallos de los servicios de inteligencia israelíes y la mortífera respuesta del Ejército israelí en Gaza".
Lee también: El ejército israelí comienza la evacuación de una zona de Rafah, en el sur de Gaza
Por otra parte, la mención especial a los periodistas palestinos estuvo acompañada por otro reconocimiento de este mismo tipo al escritor y periodista estadounidense Greg Tate (1957-2021), todo un icono desde el entorno de los medios de comunicación de la cultura afroamericana.
"Su lenguaje, procedente de la literatura, el mundo académico, la cultura popular y el hip hop, fue tan influyente como el contenido de sus ideas. Sus innovaciones estéticas y su originalidad intelectual, especialmente en su crítica pionera del hip hop, siguieron influyendo en las generaciones posteriores, sobre todo en los escritores y críticos de color", explicó la organización.
Líder político de Hamas comunica a Egipto y Qatar que acepta propuesta de tregua en Gaza

author: 网易
title: 金融行业，降薪降到怀疑人生|招行|净息差|净利息|招商银行|不良资产|知名企业_网易订阅
text:
3月26日，招商银行披露2024年度报告，年报数据显示，2024年，招商银行业务及管理费为1076.16亿元，同比下降3.73%，其中，员工费用680.88亿元，同比下降3.21%。
　　而据Wind计算，招商银行人均薪酬从2023年的58.26万元降至2024年的53.27万元，等于每个人平均每年少了5万月薪。
　　 但苦的不只是银行
　　我在金融口有个朋友，top2毕业，室友选择去了海外做金融，而他决定留在国内在金融，结果几年过去了，人生的境况变得大不相同。
　　海外的室友，收入飙涨到120万刀，而留在国内金融机构的他，年薪从毕业的60万降到现在的月入不足3万，努力果然没有选择重要。
　　 但降薪消息不是今年才有的。
　　去年网传浙大毕业入职中金的女生，工作了几年攒了三四百万，交了首付但是房子下跌已经把首付跌没了，降薪裁员房贷还不起，加上家庭、孕期等方面的各种压力下跳楼了。
　　
　　但很多朋友看到这些消息的第一反应可能不是共情。
　　因为就算按照降薪后的数字，金融行当还是很高，招商银行平均50多万年薪，怎么都很难让打工人与之共鸣。
　　 但其实金融降息的重点不是工资减少，而是金融行业工资减少背后的含义又是什么？
　　其实最直观的一点，是金融行业的经营模式可能要变了。
　　之前金融行业的经营模式，是普遍性的躺赚，而现在金融行业的经营模式，则可能是普遍性的内卷了。
　　 招行的财报是有些难看的。
　　根据财报显示，招行2024年税前利润906.44亿元，同比下降9.28%，主要营收来源净利息收入和净手续费及佣金收入皆同比下降。
　　净利息收入同比下降1.58%，净手续费及佣金收入同比降14.28%。 财富管理手续费及佣金收入220.05亿元，同比下降高达22.70%，而净利息收入同比下降约1.58%。净息差从2.03%降至1.86%。
　　 招行的财报虽然只是个例。
　　 但它充分揭示了金融行业行业的现状，那就只是之前躺平式的盈利模式走不下去了。
　　最直观的是息差，过去经济发展好的时候，银行做的事就一个，那就是这边低息拿存款，那边高息放贷，吃稳稳的息差。
　　 过去息差高，银行可谓是躺着赚钱，至于服务这块，也几乎等于没有。
　　我不知道大家还记着最早的银行服务态度不记得了，当时银行的服务，拽的跟大爷差不多，取钱，要收手续费，跨行转账，也要钱，几乎没有一处是不要钱的。
　　在余额宝出来后，人们才发现原来货币基金的利率都比银行定期存款还高那么多，银行原来那么赚钱。
　　 但现在，风向也变了。
　　净息差指净利息收入与平均生息资产的比值，也是中国银行们的生命线，是有1.8%这个明确警戒线的，但现在招商银行现在净息差从2.03%降至1.86%，也跌破了生命线。
　　 但这还远不是终点。
　　因为另一方面，银行财富管理手续费及佣金收入220.05亿元，同比下降高达22.70%，影响更深。
　　我有一个远方亲戚朋友在银行机构上班，他几乎每个月都会给我推荐一堆理财产品，但这些理财产品我去稍微研究了一下，全都是那种收费贼高，收益率贼坑的产品，完全没有现在互联网上理财产品来得实在。
　　但没办法，银行给客户提供的，都是这些产品，我不买也无所谓，因为他总能找到其它人来买这个东西，或者说，不是找，而是忽悠，因为总有不敏感的大爷大妈上这个当。
　　 但现在的情况，似乎也变了。
　　 现在只要稍微懂点的人，根本就不去银行买理财。
　　但我要说的是，这不仅仅是招行一个银行的事。
　　实际上，你要真的对比，招行是中国服务最好的商业银行，也是中国最佳零售银行，他的服务比其他银行不知道好了多少倍了。
　　 但即使这样，也出问题了。
　　现在金融降薪是方方面面的，上至监管机构，下到投行、券商、基金、银行
　　券商，之前的券商，躺着也赚钱，手续费上天，但现在的券商，开户优惠不是万一，而是万0.85还免5。
　　基金，之前的公募，完全不考虑盈亏，靠着手续费，一年做大规模年收几十亿，但现在，也降费了，别看0点几的降费，算下来那是上亿的收入。
　　投行就更不用说了，我还有一个top2朋友，2022年毕业去了投行，招聘的时候，那真的是千军万马过独木桥，但最后是啥呢？
　　这3年下来，他的工资，成功从月入8万跑到了2万。
　　而且年终奖不是缩水，是直接没有了。
　　 他现在天天想着转行，但没有行给他转。
　　 但这可能也是现在金融行业的最大问题了。
　　之前年景好的时候，金融行业，是躺着赚钱，不喜欢干有技术要求、服务要求的工作，只想赚好赚的钱，不想赚难赚的钱。
　　而现在，好赚的钱没有了，难赚的钱又赚不到了。
　　 于是乎，这个行业就变得 降薪降到怀疑人生 了。
　　而最让金融行业从业人员难受的，可能不是降薪，而是什么吧。
　　干活的自己，薪水降了，而躺平的领导，没受影响。
　　每次的改革，受伤的总是底层牛马。
　　 这可能才是整个行业最不平的事。
　　 全文完。

author: Dylan Bailey
title: Meaningful 529 Education Savings Gifts This Holiday Season
text:
Meaningful 529 Education Savings Gifts This Holiday Season
[Dylan Bailey](https://investorshangout.com/profile/view?id=78709)Updated: 12-05-2024 04:24 PM
Make This Holiday Season Special with Education Gifts
This holiday season, consider making your gift-giving more heartfelt by providing the gift of education through a 529 education savings plan. A 529 plan serves as a wonderful resource that can assist individuals and families in achieving their education dreams, making higher education more accessible. Whether you are a parent, grandparent, or friend, contributing to someone’s 529 plan can make a significant difference in their educational journey.
Understanding the Benefits of a 529 Education Savings Plan
A 529 education savings plan offers various tax advantages, allowing families to save money for their children's education. While individuals and families can manage their 529 plans, contributions can also come from friends and relatives. This unique aspect makes it an appealing option for holiday gifts, as it aligns perfectly with the spirit of giving.
Contributions and Gifting Options
The Education Plan®, a notable 529 education savings plan offered by the State of New Mexico, simplifies the process of setting up and contributing to an account. Regular contributions can maximize long-term growth, but any amount that fits your budget can positively impact the beneficiary. The plan also features an online platform called Ugift®, allowing account owners to provide friends and family with a unique code for making gift contributions, whether it's a one-time gesture or a recurring gift.
Easy Ways to Make Contributions
As the holiday season approaches, families often find themselves brainstorming ideas for meaningful gifts. Recent findings from the College Savings Foundation (CSF) reveal that 65% of parents plan to ask for contributions to their child’s 529 plan during the holidays. This number represents a notable increase from previous years, reflecting growing awareness and acceptance of educational gifting. The CSF emphasizes that more parents are becoming knowledgeable about the gifting process, which indicates a positive change in attitudes towards education funding.
Recent Trends in 529 Contributions
The results from CSF’s latest survey of parents across the country demonstrate a shift towards education saving gifts. This year, over $550 million has been reported in 529 gift contributions during the first three quarters, underscoring the increasing popularity of education-focused gifts among families. Not only does this support children's future educational endeavors, but it also showcases a change in how families view saving and investment for education.
Gifting and Tax Benefits
When you contribute to a 529 plan, it qualifies as a gift for tax purposes, providing additional motivation to consider this form of saving. Starting January 1, 2025, the federal annual gift tax exclusion will rise, allowing individuals to contribute up to $19,000 without incurring tax penalties. This means a significant opportunity for families to jumpstart savings for their children or grandchildren’s future education.
Value Beyond the Holidays
Aside from being a thoughtful holiday gift, contributing to a 529 plan offers tax deductions from New Mexico state income taxes. Funds within these accounts grow without tax implications, with withdrawals remaining tax-free if utilized for qualified educational expenses. This encompasses a variety of costs including tuition, room and board, books, and even supplies at various educational institutions, emphasizing the broad applicability of 529 plan savings.
Utilizing 529 Savings for Various Educational Needs
Funds from a 529 plan can cover expenses from community colleges to trade schools, and even K-12 tuition, making it a versatile saving tool. This aspect allows family members to help children cultivate their educational aspirations without undue financial burden. The contribution of educational savings ensures families are investing in the next generation's success.
Frequently Asked Questions
What is a 529 education savings plan?
A 529 education savings plan is a tax-advantaged account designed to help families save for higher education expenses.
Who can contribute to a 529 plan?
Anyone can contribute to a 529 plan, including friends, relatives, and family members, making it a collaborative effort in saving for education.
Are contributions to a 529 plan tax-deductible?
Yes, contributions to 529 plans can be tax-deductible from state income taxes in New Mexico.
What can 529 plan funds be used for?
Funds can be used for qualified educational expenses, including tuition, room, board, and supplies at various educational institutions and programs.
How has interest in 529 plans changed recently?
Surveys show increasing awareness of and contributions to 529 plans, with more families willing to ask for education savings gifts this holiday season.

author: BBC News 中文
title: 熱浪席捲歐洲：西班牙與英格蘭錄得有史以來最熱六月，萊茵河水位下降影響航運通行 - TNL The News Lens 關鍵評論網
text:
文：托馬斯・麥金托什（Thomas Mackintosh）、雅羅斯拉夫・盧基夫（Jaroslav Lukiv），BBC記者
歐洲正受到酷熱天氣的持續侵襲，而西班牙與英格蘭錄得有史以來最炎熱的6月。
據西班牙國家氣象局（Aemet）表示，6月的平均氣溫達攝氏23.6度，屬「極端高溫」，「打破所有紀錄」，甚至超越了該國7與8月的正常平均溫度。
在英格蘭，英國氣象局（Met Office）指出6月的平均氣溫為攝氏16.9度，創該月份的新高；就全英國而言，創下自1884年有紀錄以來第二熱的6月。
葡萄牙本土在6月錄得最高單日氣溫攝氏46.6度，該月的平均氣溫數據尚未公布。
土耳其的野火迫使數萬人撤離，義大利亦有兩人因高溫死亡。
7月1日凌晨，西班牙國家氣象局表示伊比利半島多地氣溫超過43度，但從3日起預計會出現一波降溫。
1日凌晨，西班牙南部的塞維利亞夜間氣溫高達攝氏28度，巴塞隆納也有攝氏27度。
1日稍晚，英國在倫敦聖詹姆斯公園錄得攝氏34.7度，為今年截至目前最熱的一天。
6月30日，英國倫敦希思羅機場當日最高氣溫，達攝氏33.1度。溫布頓也錄得攝氏32.9度，成為網球賽事有史以來最熱的開幕日。
根據初步數據，英國氣象局表示全英6月的平均氣溫為攝氏15.2度，是有紀錄以來第二高的6月氣溫。
英國氣象局補充稱此紀錄「僅次於2023年6月，當時錄得15.8度。」
Photo Credit: Getty Images / BBC News
由於野火肆虐，土耳其度假城市伊茲密爾附近的居民已被疏散。 在土耳其，救援人員日前已撤離超過5萬人，大多來自西部伊茲密爾省；消防隊仍在撲滅過去幾日爆發的數百場野火。
比萊吉克、哈塔伊、薩卡里亞和馬尼薩省等地也發生大火。
林業部長易卜拉欣・尤馬克利（Ibrahim Yumakli）表示，過去三天全國共處理了263宗野火。
在法國，熱浪1日繼續籠罩大部分地區。許多城市在前一天經歷了有紀錄以來最熱的6月日夜溫度。
巴黎奧利機場當天氣溫錄得攝氏37.6度。
由於歐洲熱浪加劇，巴黎艾菲爾鐵塔頂部已關閉。氣候部長阿涅絲・帕尼耶-魯納切（Agnès Pannier-Runacher）稱這是「前所未見」的情況。
巴黎地區與另外15個地區發出紅色高溫警報，也是五年來首次。
截至1日中午，法國共有1896所學校與中學因高溫關閉，這些學校皆位於紅色警報覆蓋區域內。
葡萄牙國家氣象研究所（IPMA）報告指出，6月30日摩拉市（距離里斯本約60英里）錄得攝氏46.6度，是葡萄牙本土有紀錄以來最高的6月溫度。
在義大利，據當地媒體報導，托斯卡納地區因高溫住院人數增加20%。
在義大利全國27個主要城市中，有21個地區進入最高等級的高溫警報，當中包括倫巴底與艾米利亞等13個地區，建議居民避免在白天最熱時外出。
倫巴底地區還禁止建築工地、公路及農田在高溫日中午12時半至下午4時間進行戶外作業，禁令持續至9月。
1日，義大利中部城市佛羅倫斯錄得攝氏38.9度，南部的卡利亞里則為38.6度，預計當天稍後氣溫將進一步上升。
Photo Credit: Getty Images / BBC News
巴黎鐵塔頂將於7月1日和2日全天關閉。 希臘連日來氣溫逼近攝氏40度，數起野火已燒至首都雅典附近的沿海城鎮，房屋受到毀壞，迫使居民撤離。
德國氣象局警告，1日與2日氣溫可能達到接近攝氏38度，恐怕再創高溫紀錄。
熱浪導致萊茵河水位下降，使得這條重要航運路線無法正常通行，限制了貨船運輸量並推高運輸成本。
巴爾幹半島周邊國家也正苦於高溫，但氣溫開始逐步下降。黑山亦有野火報告。
熱浪被視為嚴重的健康威脅，同時也衝擊環境。亞得里亞海水溫度升高助長有毒獅子魚等入侵物種繁殖，並進一步壓迫本已因氣候變遷而快速消融的高山冰川。
聯合國人權事務高級專員福爾克・圖爾克（Volker Turk）6月30日警告，這起熱浪凸顯了適應氣候變遷的必要性，人們必須改變現行做法與能源結構，例如逐步擺脫導致氣候變遷的化石燃料。
他對聯合國人權理事會表示：「升高的氣溫、海平面上升、洪水、乾旱與野火威脅著我們的生命權、健康權，以及乾淨、健康與永續環境的權利等。」
根據聯合國政府間氣候變遷專門委員會（IPCC），人為引起的氣候變遷使熱浪更為常見。
隨著地球持續變暖，極端高溫將更頻繁出現，強度也會增加。
英國雷丁大學氣候科學教授理查德・艾倫（Richard Allan）指出，溫室氣體濃度的上升使地球更難散發多餘的熱量。
「更溫暖、更乾旱的大氣更容易使土壤乾燥，導致熱浪加劇，中等高溫事件現在變得極端。」
本文經 《BBC News 中文》 授權轉載，原文 發表於此

author: Katie Donovan
title: Warmer temperatures for now
text:
Warm weather for the weekend
Warm weather and breezy skies are expected through the weekend. A cold front drops our temperatures to chilly ranges next week.
Warm weather for the weekend
Warm weather and breezy skies are expected through the weekend. A cold front drops our temperatures to chilly ranges next week.
HEAD TOWARDS THAT TIME FRAME. RIGHT NOW, KINGS ISLAND LOOKING LIVE HERE. LOOKS LIKE I’VE GOT A GOOD CROWD OUT THAT DIRECTION. THE FOUNTAINS ON AND THEY’RE IN FULL HAUNT MODE HERE. SO IF YOU’RE HEADING OUT TO THAT TONIGHT, IT LOOKS LIKE A REALLY GOOD NIGHT. SHOULD HAVE SOME DECENT CROWDS. THE WEATHER LOOKS COMFORTABLE AND SKIES SHOULD BE CLEAR TO PARTLY CLOUDY 61 DEGREES RIGHT NOW. SO A NICE MILD START TO THE DAY. AND THEN AS WE GO THROUGH THE AFTERNOON, TEMPERATURES START TO WARM UP AS HIGH PRESSURE CONTINUES TO HOLD TIGHT. SO WE’VE GOT A VERY SLOW MOVING COLD FRONT HERE. WE’VE GOT A FEW THUNDERSTORMS ACROSS NORTHWEST OHIO ASSOCIATED WITH THAT. WE’RE NOT EXPECTING TO SEE ANY THUNDERSTORMS SHOWERS HERE TODAY. I THINK A FEW CLOUDS DROPPING IN AS WE GO THROUGH THE AFTERNOON. BUT ONCE THIS FINALLY GETS MOVING THROUGH THE AREA THAT WILL HAPPEN TOMORROW. THAT WILL ALLOW FOR SOME BREEZIER CONDITIONS. AND IT’S GOING TO MAKE THINGS FEEL PRETTY CHILLY AS WE HEAD INTO NEXT WEEK. TODAY WE GET 78 FOR THE HIGH WARM FEW CLOUDS, ESPECIALLY THROUGH THE AFTERNOON HOURS. AND THEN TONIGHT WE’RE LOOKING AT TEMPERATURES IN THE 50S. NOT QUITE AS CHILLY TONIGHT. I THINK A LOT OF US COMING UP JUST SHY OF 60 DEGREES. SO A NICER START TO TOMORROW PROBABLY WON’T NEED AS HEAVY OF A JACKET. AND THEN TOMORROW AFTERNOON SHORTS AND T SHIRT WEATHER. WE’LL HAVE PARTLY CLOUDY TO PARTLY SUNNY SKIES, BREEZY, POSSIBLY A SPRINKLE AS THAT COLD FRONT DROPS IN SO YOUR FUTURECAST TODAY IS GOING TO SHOW THAT SCATTERED CLOUD COVER AGAIN. NO RAIN. BUT WE ARE GOING TO BE LOOKING AT CLOUDS AT LEAST THROUGH SUNSET. MAYBE A FEW PASSING CLOUDS TONIGHT. WAKING UP TO SOME SUNSHINE TOMORROW. TIMES OF SCATTERED CLOUDS TOMORROW AFTERNOON WITH A BETTER SHOT AS YOU HEAD TOWARDS SUNDAY NIGHT, YOU MIGHT SEE 1 OR 2 SPRINKLES AS THIS FRONT IS APPROACHING, BUT I THINK WHAT YOU’RE GOING TO NOTICE MORE THE BREEZIER CONDITIONS AS WE GO THROUGH YOUR SUNDAY. SO WINDS TODAY, MAYBE AROUND 15MPH. A LITTLE BIT OF A BREEZE, BUT TOMORROW YOU’RE GOING TO NOTICE THE MORE GUSTS TO 20 TO 25MPH THROUGH THE MORNING, MAYBE UP TO 30 IN SOME CITIES, AS YOU HEAD TOWARDS TOMORROW AFTERNOON. SO HERE YOU ARE AT NOON, YOU CAN SEE SOME STRONGER SOUTHWEST WINDS. THOSE WILL BE WARMING WINDS FOR US. THEY WILL START TO DECREASE AS YOU HEAD TOWARDS SUNDAY NIGHT, BUT WE ARE LOOKING AT THOSE NORTHERLY WINDS TO RETURN AS YOU HEAD INTO MONDAY, AND THAT WILL MAKE THINGS FEEL PRETTY CHILLY FOR US AS WE HEAD THROUGH THE EARLY PART OF THE WEEK. SO THE WARMTH DOES END SUNDAY. THAT’S GOING TO BE YOUR LAST DAY IN THE 80S. FOR A WHILE HERE, I WAS SAYING THIS EARLIER, YOU JUST DON’T KNOW HOW MANY MORE DAYS OF THOSE 80S YOU’RE GOING TO GET WHEN YOU START GETTING INTO MID LATE OCTOBER. SO ENJOY IT. WE’VE GOT THE WARMTH THROUGH THE AFTERNOON, BREEZY SKIES WHEN YOU’RE WATCHING THE BENGALS ON WLWT FOR SUNDAY NIGHT FOOTBALL, YOU’VE GOT GREAT WEATHER. TEMPERATURES JUST SHY OF 7050S FOR HIGHS AS YOU HEAD INTO TUESDAY AND WEDNESDAY. OVERNIGHT LOWS ARE GOING TO START TO GET CHILLIER THROUGH THE MIDWEEK TOO. SO I THINK OUR BEST SHOT AT FROST IS GOING TO BE WEDNESDAY. THURSDAY MORNING AS LOWS DIP TO THE MIDDLE 30S. RIGHT NOW, I WOULD SAY PATCHY, JUST BASED ON WHERE THOSE OVERNIGHT LOWS ARE. BUT IF WE GET A LITTLE CHILLIER, MAY END

author: Mohua Chatterjee
title: SKM seeks PM apology over ‘poll code violations’, urges top court to act | India News - Times of India
text: NEW DELHI: Samyukt Kisan Morcha (SKM), which coordinated the farmers’ protest against three farm laws that the govt finally withdrew, on Thursday demanded an apology from PM Narendra Modi for \"continuous violation\" of the model code of conduct (MCC) and urged Supreme Court to act against those who breached the law during the election period.\"SKM demands Narendra Modi, the newly-elected leader of the National Democratic Alliance, to tender public apology for the continuous violation of model code of conduct or face prosecution as per the law. All are equal before the law and Modi cannot be an exception,\" SKM said in a statement.\"Modi, along with many top leaders of BJP, violated the MCC in many ways by spreading venomous hatred against the principal minority community of India, misusing religious faith of the common people for electoral gains and resorted to blatant lies, misused state machinery and even intimidated the political opposition,\" it added.The farmers' union said it had demanded that the Election Commission take action against misuse of religion and communal propaganda by Modi, but the poll panel paid no heed.\"Consistently instigating hatred against minorities fosters alienation and insecurity among the minorities which breeds fundamentalist trends and weakens secular foundations. This provides opportunity to minority communalism, isolates minorities and hampers the common movement of farmers, workers and all oppressed sections,\" the SKM said.The farmers' union said it had demanded that the Election Commission take action against misuse of religion and communal propaganda by Modi, but the poll panel paid no heed.

organizations.name: india news - times of india new delhi

author: Belga Belga
title: ATP Miami - Première victoire en simple depuis plus de 2 ans pour Kyrgios
text:
ATP Miami - Première victoire en simple depuis plus de 2 ans pour Kyrgios
Longtemps écarté des courts à cause de blessures, l'Australien Nick Kyrgios s'est offert sa première victoire en simple depuis octobre 2022, mercredi au 1er tour du Masters 1000 de Miami.
BelgaAgence
- Publié le 19-03-2025 à 23h14
- à Miami, États-Unis
Finaliste de Wimbledon en 2022, le trublion du circuit masculin s'est imposé 3-6, 6-3, 6-4 contre l'Américain Mackenzie McDonald (101e) et affrontera au 2e tour le Russe Karen Khachanov, 23e mondial et exempté de 1er tour.
Kyrgios n'avait plus remporté de match en simple sur le circuit ATP depuis le début du mois d'octobre 2022 et une victoire au 2e tour du tournoi ATP 500 de Tokyo.
A l'exception d'une défaite au premier tour à Stuttgart en juin 2023, l'Australien n'a disputé aucun match durant les saisons 2023 et 2024.
